chapter.text: kya manushy par kaal-khand ka aisa samay bhee beeta hai ki vah koee aisee cheez na tha jisaka ullekh kiya jaata
hamane manushy ko ek mishrit veery se paida kiya, use ulatate-palatate rahe, phir hamane use sunane aur dekhanevaala bana diya
hamane use maarg dikhaaya, ab chaahe vah krtagy bane ya akrtagy
hamane inakaar karanevaalon ke lie zajeeren aur tauq aur bhadakatee huee aag taiyaar kar rakhee hai
nishchay hee vafaadaar log aise jaam se pienge jisamen kaafoor ka mishran hoga
us srot ka kya kahana! jis par baithakar allaah ke bande pienge, is tarah ki use baha-bahaakar (jahaan chaahenge) le jaenge
ve nazar (mannat) pooree karate hai aur us din se darate hai jisakee aapada vyaapak hogee
aur ve muhataaj, anaath aur qaidee ko khaana usakee chaahat rakhate hue khilaate hai
ham to keval allaah kee prasannata ke lie tumhen khilaate hai, tumase na koee badala chaahate hai aur na krtagyata gyaapan
hamen to apane rab kee or se ek aise din ka bhay hai jo tyoree par bal daale hue atyant kroor hoga.
atah allaah ne us din kee buraee se bacha liya aur unhen taazagee aur khushee pradaan kee
aur jo unhonne dhairy se kaam liya, usake badale mein unhen jannat aur reshamee vastr pradaan kiya
usamen ve takhton par tek lagae honge, ve usamen na to sakht dhoop dekhenge au na sakht thand
aur us (baag) ke sae unapar jhuke honge aur usake phalon ke guchchhe bilakul unake vash mein honge
aur unake paas chaandee ke baratan gardish mein honge aur pyaale
jo bilkul sheeshe ho rahe honge, sheeshe bhee chaandee ke jo theek andaaze karake rakhe gae honge
aur vahaan ve ek aur jaamî€¼ pienge jisamen sonth ka mishran hoga
kya kahana us srot ka jo usamen hoga, jisaka naam sal-sabeel hai
unakee seva mein aise kishor daudate rahe honge jo sadaiv kishor hee rahenge. jab tum unhen dekhoge to samajhoge ki bikhare hue motee hai
jab tum vahaan dekhoge to tumhen badee nemat aur vishaal raajy dikhaee dega
unake oopar hare baareek hare baareek reshamee vastr aur gaadhe reshamee kapade honge, aur unhen chaandee ke kangan pahanae jaenge aur unaka rab unhen pavitr pey pilaega
yah hai tumhaara badala aur tumhaara prayaas qadr karane ke yogy hai.
nishchay hee hamane atyant vyavasthit dhang se tumapar quraan avatarit kiya hai
atah apane rab ke hukm aur faisale ke lie dhairy se kaam lo aur unamen se kisee paapee ya krtaghn ka aagyaapaalan na karana
aur praatahkaal aur sandhya samay apane rab ke naam ka smaran karo
aur raat ke kuchh hisse mein bhee use sajada karo, lambee-lambee raat tak usakee tasabeeh karate raho
nissandeh ye log sheeghr praapt honevaalee cheez (sansaar) se prem rakhate hai aur ek bhaaree din ko apane pare chhod rah hai
hamane unhen paida kiya aur unake jod-band mazaboot kiee aur ham jab chaahe un jaison ko poornatah badal den
nishchay hee yah ek anusmrti hai, ab jo chaahe apane rab kee or maarg grahan kar le
aur tum nahin chaah sakate sivaay isake ki allaah chaahe. nissandeh allaah sarvagy, tatvadarshee hai
vah jise chaahata hai apanee dayaaluta mein daakhil karata hai. rahe zaalim, to unake lie usane dukhad yaatana taiyaar kar rakhee hai
